* Tremmer had smelled the battle before even coming out of the cover of the 
long grass surrounding the CF, the scent of enemies and Maximals and all 
others mixing in his mind.
Though it was clear that it was all trouble.
Transforming into robot mode, Tremmer removed a heavy machine gun from his 
waist, charging it and aiming towards the nearest target, Triggerhappy. 
Firing, 2 rounds of charges at his back.*

.........................................

* Sublime came out of the forest severel miles from the CF, seeing smoke and 
hearing weapon fire all across the grassy plain. She squinted, seeing moving 
shapes along the front of a giant ship, much smaller then their own but 
still a large ship.
There was a battle going on at the Maximal base, the place where she was 
supposed to be stationed.
With her spark beating in worry Sublime picked up her pace to a run, moving 
along the tall gress with a little trouble because she still hadn't quite 
got her land legs yet.*
